entry.content:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
<title>Chi Kung Stories</title> <link href="http://chikungstories.com"/> <link type="application/atom+xml" rel="self" href="http://chikungstories.com/feed.atom"/> <updated>{{ site.time | date_to_xmlschema }}</updated> <id>http://chikungstories.com/</id> <author> <name>Lourenco de Azevedo</name> <email>lourenco.azevedo@startmail.com</email> </author>
{% for post in site.posts %} <entry> <id>http://chikungstories.com{{ post.id }}</id> <link type="text/html" rel="alternate" href="http://chikungstories.com{{ post.url }}"/> <title>{{ post.title }}</title> <published>{{ post.date | date_to_xmlschema }}</published> <updated>{{ post.date | date_to_xmlschema }}</updated> <author> <name>"Lourenco de Azevedo"</name> <uri>http://chikungstories.com</uri> </author> <content type="html">{{ page.content | xml_escape }}</content> </entry> {% endfor %}
</feed>

entry.title: Chi Kung Myths - Part one
entry.content:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <feed xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom">
<title>Chi Kung Stories</title> <link href="http://chikungstories.com"/> <link type="application/atom+xml" rel="self" href="http://chikungstories.com/feed.atom"/> <updated>{{ site.time | date_to_xmlschema }}</updated> <id>http://chikungstories.com/</id> <author> <name>Lourenco de Azevedo</name> <email>lourenco.azevedo@startmail.com</email> </author>
{% for post in site.posts %} <entry> <id>http://chikungstories.com{{ post.id }}</id> <link type="text/html" rel="alternate" href="http://chikungstories.com{{ post.url }}"/> <title>{{ post.title }}</title> <published>{{ post.date | date_to_xmlschema }}</published> <updated>{{ post.date | date_to_xmlschema }}</updated> <author> <name>"Lourenco de Azevedo"</name> <uri>http://chikungstories.com</uri> </author> <content type="html">{{ page.content | xml_escape }}</content> </entry> {% endfor %}
</feed>

entry.title: The sum of all parts
entry.content:
